subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tina Charles scored 15 points and had 11 rebounds as No. 5 Connecticut defeated visiting Sacred Heart, 82-40 yesterday, giving Coach Geno Auriemma his 600th career victory.
snippet: Tina Charles scored 15 points and had 11 rebounds as No. 5 Connecticut defeated visiting Sacred Heart, 82-40 yesterday, giving Coach Geno Auriemma his 600th career victory.
